title: Oman Invests Millions In Crypto Amid Questions of Whether It's Sharia Compliant
description: The debate is ongoing among Islamic scholars at a time when the Muslim world is forging ahead in crypto adoption.

title: Police Use Advanced AI and Drones to Catch Speeding Drivers, Sparking Concerns
description: As technology advances, police forces across the UK are embracing high-tech solutions to catch speeding drivers. Gary Digva, founder of Road Angel, warned that the development and adoption of AI-powered devices are increasing rapidly. Existing speed cameras are expected to be phased out and replaced by smarter, more advanced technology that can identify multiple traffic ... Read more

title: Wells Fargo Pays $35,000,000 Fine for Allegedly Overcharging Millions of Dollars to Customers
description:
Wells Fargo is dishing out tens of millions of dollars to settle allegations that the banking giant charged its customers excessive fees for investment advice. In a new press release, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) claims that Wells Fargo collected an additional $26.8 million in advisory fees after overcharging more than 10,900 customers. […]

The post Wells Fargo Pays $35,000,000 Fine for Allegedly Overcharging Millions of Dollars to Customers appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

title: Trader Who Rode 2023 Crypto Rally Warns of Fake Bitcoin Breakout if ETF Gets Approved – Here’s His Outlook
description:
A trader who caught the crypto rally earlier this year is warning that Bitcoin bulls could be victims of a trap if a spot-based BTC exchange-traded fund (ETF) gets the green light from regulators.
